General.Name: Batulicin Nusantara Maritim Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Batulicin Nusantara Maritim Tbk provides sea and river transportation services in Indonesia. It transports coal from the company's tugboats and barges to the mother vessel. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Tanah Bumbu, Indonesia. PT Batulicin Nusantara Maritim Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Batulicin Enam Sembilan Transportasi.
General.Address: Jl. Pelabuhan Ferry No.69 Kelurahan, Tanah Bumbu, Indonesia, 72271
